message: The COVERAGE field for indicator 16-4-2, translated into all languages

data.en: Available nationally and by weapon type ([MDNAC: Weapons, Grenades, Cartridges, Bombs]; [MSPGC: Weapons, Grénades, Cartridges, Bombs])
